main event: A sighting of blinking bright green and white streaked lights moving erratic in all directions was reported on May 26, 1962, in Elgin, Ontario.
interesting points: The lights appeared larger and brighter than stars., The lights moved erratically, sometimes forming distinct shapes., The report suggests the lights may be characteristic of normal aircraft., Comments in the report indicate no solid evidence of an unidentified object., Observers included experienced astronomers and local residents.
sighted object: blinking bright green and white lights
witness description: Marion Fanzke and her husband reported the sighting.
